tool_description: Validates metadata records against specified standards including Dublin Core, MARC21, MODS, and custom schemas.

metadata_records.description: Array of metadata record identifiers or content to validate

schema_standard.description: Metadata schema standard: dublin_core, marc21, mods, or custom

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: strict, moderate, or lenient

custom_schema_url.description: URL to custom schema definition if schema_standard is custom

required_fields.description: List of fields that must be present in each record

error_messages: Invalid schema standard: Use dublin_core, marc21, mods, or custom
Custom schema required: Provide custom_schema_url when using custom standard
Invalid validation level: Use strict, moderate, or lenient
Schema fetch failed: Unable to retrieve custom schema from provided URL
Empty metadata records: Provide at least one metadata record to validate
usage: Provide metadata_records and schema_standard. For custom schemas, include custom_schema_url. Set validation_level and required_fields as needed for your validation requirements.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or partial

valid_records.description: Number of records that passed validation
